title: Mastery 6 Token (Thresh)
body: I have played a endless amounts of matches with my favorite/main Thresh and it seems that I have gotten multiple rank S- or higher to earn a Master 6 token. But from all the S ranks I have earn with Thresh while having him at level 5 mastery already. I have not once gotten a token for this achievement. I'm starting to feel all my efforts to continually earn consistent amount of S- or Higher rank is becoming useless. Anyway to resolve this issue cause I tried everything and it seems I has become impossible to earn the Mastery 6 Token. Any solution to provide? I have Thresh at Mastery Level 5: Guardian with 31307 Total Champion Points. I have at least earned a minimum of 11 rank of S- or higher. What can I do at this point?

replies.body: What game modes were you playing when you got these S ranks? You can only earn the mastery level 6/7 tokens while playing normal or ranked SR matches. You cannot earn them while playing ARAM, TT, or any of the rotating game modes.

This is correct, great catch, Zombiemaster! Complete information about Champion Mastery can be found [in our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)

If you have any questions, let me know.

Half of them were earned in normal SR matches. Though that a very good note. Should be included in the champion icon scripting "Rank S- or higher to earn a Master 6 token. Combine 2 tokens to advance further" they should note that it can only be earned normal or ranked SR matches. I know it's in the FAQ but it can clarify easier to new players or sole focus on getting the Master 6 or 7. Though its weird I know I have gotten at least 3 rank of S- or higher at a normal SR Matches.
